title: Graph Category
desc: Set the category of graph to be used

title: Weighted
desc: Set if the generated graph should have weighted edges

title: Planar Type
desc: Set the type of planar graph to be used

title: Nodes
desc: Set the no of nodes to be used

title: Clipping Distance
desc: Set the minimum clipping distance to be used

title: Random Function
desc: Set the random function to be used for point generation

title: Keep Same
desc: Set if the same node positions is to be used

title: Sparse
desc: Set if the graph is to be a sparse graph

title: Degree
desc: Set the maximum degree of a node in the graph

title: Seed
desc: Set the random seed to be used

title: Tree Type
desc: Set the type of tree to be used

title: Branching factor
desc: Set the branching factor of the tree

title: Height
desc: Set the height of the tree

title: Lattice Type
desc: Set the type of lattice to be used

title: Lattice Rows
desc: Set the no of lattice rows to be used (cols in rectangular grid)

title: Lattice Columns
desc: Set the no of lattice columns to be used (rows in rectangular grid)
